key.name: keyword-search-url
key.description: Search string for keywords entered in the URL bar.

key.name: user-agent
key.description: String that will be used as user agent, to identify the browser to the web servers.

key.name: automatic-downloads
key.description: When files cannot be opened by the browser they are automatically downloaded to the download folder and opened with the appropriate application.

key.name: new-windows-in-tabs
key.summary: Force new windows to be opened in tabs
key.description: Force new window requests to be opened in tabs instead of using a new window.

key.name: remember-passwords
key.description: Whether to store and prefill passwords in websites.

key.name: managed-network
key.summary: Automatically manage offline status with NetworkManager

key.name: internal-view-source
key.summary: Don't use an external application to view page source.

key.name: restore-session-policy
key.summary: Whether to automatically restore the last session
key.description: Defines how the session will be restored during startup. Allowed values are 'always' (the previous state of the application is always restored), 'crashed' (the session is only restored if the application crashes) and 'never' (the homepage is always shown).

key.name: restore-session-delaying-loads
key.summary: Whether to delay loading of tabs that are not immediately visible on session restore
key.description: When this option is set to true, tabs will not start loading until the user switches to them, upon session restore.

key.name: process-model
key.description: This option allows to set the process model used. Use 'shared-secondary-process' to use a single web process shared by all the tabs and 'one-secondary-process-per-web-view' to use a different web process for each tab.

key.name: max-processes
key.summary: Maximum number of web processes created at the same time when using 'one-secondary-process-per-web-view' model
key.description: This option sets a limit to the number of web processes that will be used at the same time for the 'one-secondary-process-per-web-view' model. The default value is '0' and means no limit.

key.name: always-show-tabs-bar
key.description: [Deprecated] This setting is deprecated, use 'tabs-bar-visibility-policy' instead.

key.name: downloads-hidden
key.description: Hide or show the downloads window. When hidden, a notification will be shown when new downloads are started.

key.name: tabs-bar-visibility-policy
key.summary: The visibility policy for the tabs bar.
key.description: Controls when the tabs bar is shown. Possible values are 'always' (the tabs bar is always shown), 'more-than-one' (the tabs bar is only shown if there's two or more tabs) and 'never' (the tabs bar is never shown).

key.name: use-gnome-fonts
key.description: Use GNOME font settings.

key.name: sans-serif-font
key.description: A value to be used to override sans-serif desktop font when use-gnome-fonts is set.

key.name: serif-font
key.description: A value to be used to override serif desktop font when use-gnome-fonts is set.

key.name: monospace-font
key.description: A value to be used to override monospace desktop font when use-gnome-fonts is set.

key.name: use-own-colors
key.description: Use your own colors instead of the colors the page requests.

key.name: use-own-fonts
key.description: Use your own fonts instead of the fonts the page requests.

key.name: enable-user-css
key.description: Use a custom CSS file to modify websites own CSS.

key.name: enable-spell-checking
key.description: Spell check any text typed in editable areas.

key.name: default-encoding
key.description: Default encoding. Accepted values are the ones WebKitGTK+ can understand.

key.name: language
key.description: Preferred languages, two letter codes.

key.name: cookies-policy
key.description: Where to accept cookies from. Possible values are "always", "no-third-party" and "never".

key.name: image-animation-mode
key.description: How to present animated images. Possible values are "normal", "once" and "disabled".

key.name: enable-popups
key.description: Allow sites to open new windows using JavaScript (if JavaScript is enabled).

key.name: enable-webgl
key.description: Whether to enable support for WebGL contexts.

key.name: enable-webaudio
key.description: Whether to enable support for WebAudio.

key.name: do-not-track
key.description: Whether to tell websites that we do not wish to be tracked. Please note that web pages are not forced to follow this setting.

key.name: enable-adblock
key.description: Whether to block the embedded advertisements that web pages might want to show.

key.name: download-dir
key.description: The path of the folder where to download files to; or "Downloads" to use the default downloads folder, or "Desktop" to use the desktop folder.

key.name: bookmarks-view-title
key.summary: Whether to show the title column in the bookmarks window.

key.name: bookmarks-view-address
key.summary: Whether to show the address column in the bookmarks window.
